attributes.long-description:
A super creative puzzle platformer!
Welcome to Max & the Magic Marker – Gold Edition, an award-winning physics-based puzzle platformer that plays like a classic - but with a twist!

You control a magic marker that enables you to draw and manipulate the gameworld!

Master Max’s extraordinary talent through:
-58 awesome levels
-3 unique worlds
-Challenging puzzles
-Lots of trophies

The Gold edition exclusively includes
-3 boss fights
-New enemies
-New updated graphics
-Lots of extra love

Overcome the puzzles as quick as you can, and find a way to the evil monster who wants to damage Max's drawings. Collect ink and golden spheres, and if you’re feeling keen, find each elusive black sphere.

** Winner of the Independent Games Festival 2010 (IGF) D2D Vision Award! **

Max & the Magic Marker - Gold Edition Trial © 2011 PAN Vision AB and Press Play ApS. All Rights Reserved. Developed by Press Play ApS. Published by PAN Vision AB. PlayStation®Move features require PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye (sold separately).

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
attributes.name: Max & the Magic Marker - Gold Edition
